Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Simple-minded \Sim"ple-mind`ed\, a. Artless; guileless; simple-hearted; undesigning; unsuspecting; devoid of duplicity. --Blackstone. -- {Sim"ple-mind`ed*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
simple mindedness n : a lack of penetration or subtlety; "they took advantage of her simplicity" [syn: {simplicity}]
